info.name: Gruvbox minimal
info.description: Simple Firefox theme that styles the nav bar and tabs into one line without removing the menu button. Uses the Gruvbox color scheme (www.github.com/morhetz/gruvbox). Made for personal use, so untested on other machines, through requests and bug reports are welcome. Hosted with â™¥ at GitHub www.github.com/miscoined/firefox-gruvbox-min.git
info.additionalInfo: Gruvbox color scheme by Morhetz - www.github.com/morhetz/gruvbox
